def-en: In the context of a knowledge graph, the task of predicting a new triple (that is not in the graph) based on the triples that are in the graph.
def-ga: I gcomhthéacs graif eolais, tasc a bhfuil mar sprioc aige abairt thriarach nua (nach bhfuil a ngraf) a réamhinsint bunaithe ar na habairtí triaracha atá sa ngraf.

prov.réamhinsinte: féach ar an téarma 'link prediction (LP) / réamhinsint nasc (RN)'
prov.nasc: féach ar an téarma 'link prediction (LP) / réamhinsint nasc (RN)'

notes: Féach ar an téarma 'link prediction (LP) / réamhinsint nasc (RN)'
